title: If You Could Hear What I See: Triumph Over Tragedy Through Laughter
description: The author shares her painful childhood of growing up hearing-impaired where she used humor to overcome many obstacles and traumatic events, details the people who profoundly impacted her life and urged her to follow her dreams, and reveals how she used laughter, courage, and pride to deal with life's many surprises. Reprint.
author: Kathy Buckley
